About Me

Hi, I’m Alessio a Computer Engineer passionate about Artificial Intelligence with a strong mathematical understanding of Machine Learning Algorithms. I currently do robust design and programming for a company in the military industry.

I am most skilled in: Python, C++, Java, OOP, TensorFlow and Machine Learning

Projects

Deep Learning for Powerline Cable Segmentation

https://github.com/alessiodiluzio/Deep-Learning-for-Powerline-Cable-Segmentation

This is my Master Thesis Work and probably the project that best highlights my skills.

This work is aimed to address powerline cable’s detection to guarantee the safe navigation of drones. Wire’s detection has been modelled as an image segmentation task. I designed and implemented a Deep Neural Network that solves the problem. I used Python and TensorFlow low-level api to customize training loop and Network Layer’s operations.

Template Matching using Optimized TensorFlow api

https://github.com/alessiodiluzio/ML-Optimized-Template-Matching

I developed this project in my free time after I started working.

This project is Python/Tensorflow implementation of the Siamese Network at https://arxiv.org/abs/1606.09549, used to solve Template Matching problem with a Machine Learning approach.
I experimented with success TensorFlow tf.Function to improve performances.

Template Matching using OpenCV Algorithms with a pretty Qt GUI

https://github.com/alessiodiluzio/OpenCV-Template-Matching-with-Qt

This project shows the skills I developed after I started working with C++ and Qt

This application performs Template Matching using OpenCV algorithms for similarity measures. It has a pretty GUI implemented with Qt Framework.

Experience

MBDA IT

As a member of the Short Range Air Defense Software Group I am responsible of the full life cycle management (Design, Documentation, Development and Testing) of highly available software component for real-time Command And Control tactical software for missile weapon systems.
